alert.note: Alert for Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 11 at 8:35PM EST until December 12 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...In Virginia, Central Virginia Blue Ridge and Northern Virginia Blue Ridge, and Eastern Highland County. In West Virginia, Eastern Pendleton County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A few gusts to around 60 mph are possible, especially at elevations above 3000 feet.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge
